statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' LIMIT 1;
SELECT last_name, first_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_data WHERE email_address NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE address IN ('456 Elm St', '789 Oak St') ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInfo;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInfo WHERE email='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, payment_method FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM CustomerInfo WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInfo WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerInfo WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(purchase_id) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerInfo JOIN PurchaseHistory ON CustomerInfo.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE PurchaseHistory.payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE address = '123 Main St' AND phone_number = '555-1234';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 3 ORDER BY num_orders DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT city, country FROM addresses WHERE postal_code = '12345';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customers.name, orders.product, payments.amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customers.name, addresses.city, addresses.country FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.id = addresses.customer_id ORDER BY addresses.city, customers.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_info;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address_line, city, postal_code FROM customers_info ci INNER JOIN customer_addresses ca ON ci.customer_id = ca.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sale_amount FROM sales_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers_info WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers_info ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2

SELECT c.customer_name, a.city, o.total_amount FROM customers_info c INNER JOIN customer_addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS highest_sale_amount FROM sales_history
